name: Polytrade CARBOBINDER
description: Polytrade CarboBinder is a powerful powdered thermoplastic natural resin with high tackiness for solvent-based automotive sealants and adhesives.Our product has excellent compatibility with nitryl rubber and antioxidant agents. CarboBinder is soluble in several solvents, such as acetone, ethyl alcohol, and ethyl acetate. Once solubilized and mixed into formulations, this thermoplastic resin has a high resistance to ethyl alcohol and gasoline, making it a raw material ideal for applications in the automotive industry.
